data.text: @Nimbyyimbywtf Ben used to be a pretty objective subway chronicler esp the delays in the SAS but a couple of years ago he got religion.

@ImpunityCity @Nimbyyimbywtf The sad part about all this is that the bike infrastructure they're pushing for is really a cheap way to address our problems by doing as little as possible to actually solve our problems. Let's push bike infrastructure to get the "wrong" ppl out and the "right" ppl in and save $

@Nimbyyimbywtf 2nd ave soggy is the biggest and dumbest coward Twitter account. It's hysterical how the irony is not lost on him since he's sort of a reporter himself with his subway blog and also that he doesn't even
Take the subway anymore
It was part of this thread 🤡 https://t.co/EgtElMqAfB
